definition.value: Kaad a Wɔde Bɔ Ka / Debit Kaad (Via Paypal) .
Paypal Aguadi

Wo API Client ID
Hwehwɛ eyi wɔ Me Apps & Credentials Ɔfã Of Paypal Dashboard -> Developer

Wo API Ahintasɛm Safoa
Hwehwɛ eyi wɔ Me Apps & Credentials Ɔfã Of Paypal Dashboard -> Developer
Sɔhwɛ Mode

Ɔkwan a wɔfa so di gua:
PayPal asɛm a ɛbɛkɔ so wɔ adetɔfoɔ checkout ansa na wɔahyɛ order tebea. Tumi krataa nkutoo anaasɛ capture.
Kyere
Ma Tumi Nkutoo
Sɔ Nkitahodi hwɛ
Sɔ hwɛ Seesei
Yɛ Webhooks no foforo
Wɔbɛhyehyɛ Webhooks no ara kwa bere a wɔrekɔ PayPal so no. Fa saa bɔtn yi di dwuma de yɛ webhooks foforo wɔ PayPal mu
Wɔde nkitahodi asi hɔ yiye.
Sikatua
Odi nkonim: Woayɛ nsakrae wɔ Paypal sikatua nhyehyɛe mu!
Beaeɛ:
Mmeae a Ɛwɔ Hɔ Nyinaa
Gyinabea:

Auto Select:
Wubetumi ayɛ nhyehyɛe sɛ wubehuw sikatua krataafa no sɛ sikatua ho ɔkwan biako pɛ na ɛwɔ hɔ a. Wɔbɛpaw ɔkwan a wɔfa so tua sika yi ara kwa
Ɛsɛ sɛ wo ne paypal di nkitaho na woasiesie sikatua ho nsɛm
Paypal nhyehyɛe ahorow
Hyehyɛ Nhyehyɛe
Sɔhwɛ Mode
Yɛ Webhooks Endpoints foforo wɔ API afã
Wɔayɛ Webhooks Endpoints no foforo yiye!

Success & captured:
Paw main order tebea a wopɛ sɛ wode si hɔ de bua payment processor tebea

Success & not captured:
Paw main order tebea a wopɛ sɛ wode si hɔ de bua payment processor tebea

Pow:
Order tebea a wopɛ sɛ wokyerɛw wɔ abakɔsɛm mu de bua payment processor tebea. Main order tebea no nnya nkɛntɛnso. Ɛnyɛ bere a wɔatua no yiye akyi nkutoo na wɔrenkra.
Retwɛn:

Refunded:
Order status a wopɛ sɛ wɔde si hɔ sɛ wɔsan tua ka wɔ admin/order mu a.
Da a Wɔde Di Dwuma
Sika
Wɔfaa sika yiye
Capture no dii nkonim, order status updated to success - captured
Wɔyɛɛ sika a wɔde bɛsan ama no ho adwuma yiye
Refund no dii nkonim, order status updated to refunded
Void dii nkonim, wɔyɛɛ order tebea no foforo kɔɔ voided
Auto (ma tumi na kyere) .
Wɔakyɛ (wɔma ho kwan nkutoo) .
Katua ho Nsɛm
Wɔkyeree sika a wotua no
Wɔsɛee sika a wotua no
Wɔsan de sika a wotuae no mae
Nkyeremu Dodow
Sika a Wɔde Sane
Paypal Charge ID a wɔde tua ho ka
Sika dodow a wɔama ho kwan nyinaa
Sika a wɔde bɛka ho
Nkitahodi a Wɔsan de Sika Ma
Yɛsrɛ sɛ si so dua sɛ wopɛ sɛ wopopa sikatua no?
Yɛsrɛ wo si so dua sɛ wopɛ sɛ wokyere sikatua no?
Yɛsrɛ sɛ si so dua sɛ wopɛ sɛ wosan tua sika no?
San tua bra
Hunu
Kyere
Mfomso a ɛwɔ mu. Hwɛ mfomso log anaa input parameters!
Yɛsrɛ sɛ kyerɛw sika a ɛyɛ papa
Entumi nkyere, nsiesie asɛm no ho nsɛm na hwɛ sika dodow a wɔkyeree
Entumi nsɛe asɛm no, nsiesie na nhwɛ asɛm no ho nsɛm
Wontumi nsan mfa sika mma, nsiesie asɛm no ho nsɛm na nhwɛ sika a wɔde bɛsan ama no
Fa Paypal di nkitaho
Twa Paypal no mu
Wontumi nkɔ nkitahodi?
Wɔakɔ Paypal so yiye
Wɔatwa Paypal nkitahodi no mu yiye
Kɔkɔbɔ: Wonni kwan sɛ wobɛsesa Paypal Commerce Payment!
Auto (ma tumi na kyere) .
Wɔakyɛ (wɔma ho kwan nkutoo) .
Mfomso a ɛwɔ mu. Hwɛ mfomso log anaa input parameters!
App Client ID na ɛho hia
App Secret safoa no ho hia
Kɔkɔbɔ: Wonni kwan sɛ wobɛsesa Paypal Commerce Payment!
Mfomsoɔ! Yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ sɛ wɔadan extension no ON anaa.
Akyire

Hyɛ no nsow: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wuwie nhyehyɛe a ɛsɛ sɛ wobɔ webhooks wɔ Paypal Account Side.
Kɔ Wo Paypal Dashboard Developer Ɔfa na Fa Endpoints ka ho a wogye nsɛm a esisi fi wo akontaabu mu. Bere a wɔayɛ Endpoint akyi no, kɔpi Signing Secret na fa sie Paypal Subscription Extension nhyehyɛe no mu.
